---
title: "Czech Vegetation Database"
---

This is a website of the Czech National Phytosociological Database, here referred to as Czech Vegetation Database, curated under [Department of Botany and Zoology](https://botzool.sci.muni.cz), Faculty of Science, Masaryk University, Brno, Czech Republic.
